title: Rengars bonetooth necklace

replies.body: Most people hate rengar so that is an unpopular decision, buffing rengar for snowballing even harder then the norm

well, i am a rengar main so...... and plus, 10 more trophies is alot it would take him around 10 min to gather. Also Rengar is easy to counter, just get a {{item:3075}} and{{item:3047}} and a{{item:3143}}  then he is pretty much useless....

Well I _was_ a Rengar main but I fell out with him after I realized he is so tricky when it comes to staying relavent/ not being too much a hardcarry that all the enemy team has to do is delete you and then gg. 10 trophies reward him for doing bonkers damage and getting away with it, though if the enemy team is wary of you at least one of those two things shouldn't really happen
